T02D3147:170a-1: tri sa ma yam sa ma ya s'a dha nam /
T02D3147:170a-3: dam tshig gsum gyi dam tshig gi sgrub thabs /
T02D3147:170a-5: dam chos gshe bar mi bya zhing //
T02D3147:170a-6: spang bar nam yang ma yin no //
T02D3147:170a-7: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems //
T02D3147:170a-8: de dag kun min bya ba min //
T02D3147:170a-9: bla ma dbang bya brnyas mi bya //
T02D3147:170a-10: lus can rnams ni brdeg mi bya //
T02D3147:170a-11: sngags dang phyag rgya rang mi bya //
T02D3147:170a-12: chud kyang nges par mi gsan no //
T02D3147:170a-13: ser sna dang ni chang btung bar //
T02D3147:170a-14: nam yang bya ba ma yin no //
T02D3147:170a-15: rdo rje'i gzugs ni mi 'gong zhing //
T02D3147:170b-0: bza' bar bya ba @170b nyid kyang min //
T02D3147:170b-1: nyal khri stan du mi bya zhing //
T02D3147:170b-2: phyag rgya sogs la ma gus spang //
T02D3147:170b-3: bla ma dag gam lha la yang //
T02D3147:170b-4: byis pa'i chos nyid mi bya'o //
T02D3147:170b-5: rang bzhin bzang dang nyes byed la'ang //
T02D3147:170b-6: mngon spyod bya ba ma yin no //
T02D3147:170b-7: nyon mongs bya min byed gzhug dang //
T02D3147:170b-8: yid rang bar yang mi bya'o ;
T02D3147:170b-9: / mdor na bdag gzhan rjes mi mthun //
T02D3147:170b-10: gang yin de dag spang bar bya //
T02D3147:170b-11: dam tshig 'di ni rtog chen dpal //
T02D3147:170b-12: dam tshig gsum gsungs dam tshig yin //
T02D3147:170b-13: g-yo sgyu dang ni log 'tsho dang //
T02D3147:170b-14: dri ma la dga' tshogs par 'du //
T02D3147:170b-15: yid gnyis za bar byed pa dang //
T02D3147:170b-16: yo byad phal cher yongs su 'dzin //
T02D3147:170b-17: snyom las zhum pa'i sems nyid dad //
T02D3147:170b-18: bdag bstod la sogs de bzhin te //
T02D3147:170b-19: bar chad byed par gyur pa'i chos //
T02D3147:170b-20: rtog pa'i rgyal po las 'di gsungs //
T02D3147:170b-21: skyon 'di rnams las nges grol zhing //
T02D3147:170b-22: sngar bshad dam tshig la gnas na //
T02D3147:170b-24: rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yid brtan //
T02D3147:170b-25: lus ngag yid kyi 'jug pa kun //
T02D3147:170b-26: skye dgu skyob phyir phan brtson pas //
T02D3147:170b-27: dngos grub dam tshig gsum gsungs pa //
T02D3147:170b-29: pandi ta chen po rin chen 'byung gnas spas pas mdzad pa'i dam tshig gi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
